heroSubtitle: A modern platform to help you find your lost items and reunite found items with their owners.
feature1Desc: Search our database to find lost items reported by our community.
feature2Desc: Report a lost or found item to notify others.
feature3Desc: Manage found items in your business and connect with owners.
successQuote: I left my laptop at a coffee shop and thought it was gone forever. Thanks to FindItNow, someone found it and I had it back the next day!
faqLink2: What should I do if I find something?
faqLink4: How do I claim my item?
testimonialsSubtitle: Stories of recovered items and happy reunions.
footerReuniting: Reuniting people and businesses with the things they love.
browseSubtitle: Find what you're looking for in our community database.
browseNoItemsDesc: Try changing your search or filter criteria.
browseItemNotFoundDesc: The item you were looking for could not be found.
isThisYourItemDesc: If you believe this is your lost item, please fill out the form below to submit a claim. Provide as much detail as possible to prove ownership.
itemResolvedDesc: This item has been marked as resolved and returned to its owner.
contactSubtitle: Have a question or a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactToastSuccessDesc: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contactToastErrorDesc: Could not send message. Please try again later.
contactInfoDesc: Reach out to us through the channels below.
hiwStep1Desc: Browse our database of lost and found items.
hiwStep2Desc: Create a detailed report for your lost or found item.
hiwStep3Desc: Receive alerts when your item is found or a found item is claimed.
hiwStep4Desc: Connect with the finder or owner to arrange the return.
faq1Content: FindItNow is a platform that helps people recover their lost belongings by connecting them with the people who found them. We also provide solutions for businesses to manage their lost and found.
faq2Title: How do I report a lost or found item?
faq2Content: Simply click the 'Report a Lost Item' or 'Report a Found Item' button on the homepage or in the header. Fill out the form with as much detail as possible, including photos, to increase the chances of a successful reunion.
faq3Content: Yes, the basic service for individuals to report and search for lost or found items is free. We offer premium features and business plans for organizations.
faq4Title: What should I do if I find an item listed on the site?
faq4Content: On the item's detail page, you will find an option to contact the owner (if it's a lost item) or make a claim (if it's a found item). Follow the prompts to initiate a secure communication.
faq5Content: Claimants are required to provide detailed information that only the true owner would know, such as the exact location the item was lost, specific distinguishing marks, or the contents of a bag or wallet.
faq6Content: Policies for unclaimed items vary depending on local regulations and the policies of the partner location (if the item was found there). Generally, items are donated or disposed of after a certain period if they remain unclaimed.
loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signupSubtitle: Join our community to help recover your items.
forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a code to reset your password.
accountSubtitle: Manage your profile information and your reported items.
accountNoSubmissionsDesc: When you report an item, it will appear here.
accountDeleteItemDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your item listing.
reportFormLostDesc: Please provide as many details as possible about the item you lost.
reportFormFoundDesc: Thank you for taking the time to report a found item. Please provide details.
reportFormEditDesc: Update the information for your reported item.
reportFormDescPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of the item, including color, brand, size, and any other relevant information.
reportFormContactEmailDescNew: This will be used to notify you about your item. You will need to verify your email with a one-time code.
reportFormContactEmailDescAuth: This email is associated with your account.
reportFormContactEmailDescExisting: The contact email cannot be changed.
reportFormImageDescNew: Upload a clear picture of the item.
reportFormImageDescExisting: Upload a new image to replace the current one.
claimFormProofPlaceholder: Describe the item in detail. Mention distinguishing marks, contents of a bag, lock screen wallpaper, etc.
haveYouFoundThisDesc: If you have found this item, please notify the owner by filling out the form below. You can arrange details to return it safely.
enquiriesSubtitle: Here are the open enquiries and claims for the items you've reported.
enquiriesNoEnquiriesDesc: When someone claims an item you've reported, you'll see it here.
feedbackDesc: We're glad you got your {{itemName}} back! Please take a moment to rate your experience.
feedbackDefaultStory: I was so happy to get my {{itemName}} back! The process was straightforward.
feedbackToastSuccessDesc: Your feedback has been submitted successfully.
feedbackToastErrorDesc: Could not submit feedback. Please try again later.
partnerLoginSubtitle: Access your business dashboard to manage found items.
partnerRegisterSubtitle: Register your business to easily manage lost & found submissions.
partnerDashboardSubtitle: Welcome to your dashboard! Here you can report new found items and view open claims.
partnerRecentItemsDesc: Here's a list of the most recent items you've reported.
privacyIntroContent: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacyInfoCollectContent1: We may collect personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, and contact information when you register or report an item. We also collect details about the items you report, including descriptions and images.
privacyInfoCollectContent2: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service. This Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit.
privacyInfoUseContent: We use your information to provide and maintain the Service, to manage your account, and to connect you with other users to facilitate the return of items. We may also use your information to communicate with you, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the service.
privacyInfoShareContent: We may share your information in connection with any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company. We also share the information you provide about lost and found items to facilitate reunions.
privacyInfoKeepContent: We will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations.
privacyInfoSafeContent: The security of Your information is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyMinorsContent: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.
privacyRightsContent: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, or delete the personal information we hold about you. To exercise these rights, please contact us.
termsAgreementContent: By accessing the Site, you represent that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with all of these Terms and Conditions, then you are expressly prohibited from using the Site and you must discontinue use immediately.
termsServiceDescContent: FindItNow provides an online platform that enables users to report and search for lost and found items. The service is designed to help individuals and organizations reunite lost items with their rightful owners. We are not involved in the actual exchange of items.
termsUserConductContent: You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that might harm, disable, overburden, or impair the Service. You agree not to provide any inaccurate or misleading information.
termsDisclaimersContent: The Service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. FindItNow makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties. We do not guarantee the Service will be secure or that any lost items will be returned.
termsLiabilityContent: In no event shall FindItNow or its directors, employees, or agents be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, consequential, exemplary, incidental, special, or punitive damages arising from your use of the Service.
termsGoverningLawContent: These Terms shall be governed by and defined following the laws of the jurisdiction in which the Company is based, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.subjectMin: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.messageMax: Message must be less than 1000 characters.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.proofMin: Please provide a detailed description as proof of ownership (at least 20 characters).
validation.storyMin: Please share a bit more about your experience.
validation.storyMax: Your story must be 500 characters or less.
validation.itemNameMin: Item name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.
validation.locationMin: Location must be at least 3 characters.
